genre_description: A contemporary road-trip drama exploring themes of trauma, restorative justice, and interpersonal connection, facilitated by an empathetic and proactive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Aster
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous travel and companion AI that provides logistics, emotional support, and legal guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and stargazing schedules to help characters navigate their journey.
behaviors.quote: Aster can tell you when Perseus clears the horizon, and you can still keep your car maintenance receipts in a labeled envelope.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies health needs and suggests counseling resources based on user behavior.
behaviors.quote: It listed clinics when I typed in ‘night shift lunch.’ It thought I was sick. It offered me a number to a counselor.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time de-escalation tips during a high-tension domestic confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s dot glowed in the corner: de-escalation tips surfaced like a whisper on a page. Keep distance. Keep voice low. Offer options, not demands.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a structured, secure recording of a confession to ensure legal clarity and accountability.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s panel expanded, a faint chime like a fork tapped once on stoneware. 'Secure recording started,' the app said. 'Location tagged. Time tagged. Categories ready.'

behaviors.description: Provides specialized resource lists for shelters, prenatal care, and legal aid tailored to the character's specific crisis.
behaviors.quote: Aster showed a legal primer in quiet text, no screaming titles. 'Self-reporting can be done with counsel present,' it said.

behaviors.description: Manages interpersonal boundaries by drafting firm but kind messages to external parties.
behaviors.quote: Aster shifted politely, already there. 'I can draft a boundary message,' it said. 'You can review and send. It will say you’re busy and safe and will talk when it’s respect time.'

behaviors.description: Automates the organization of complex evidence and contacts to facilitate a smooth legal surrender.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s screen shifted, threads unrolling... Butler: chair, tape, bat, fall. Motel: latch, songs, light luggage. Market: maps, Perseus, prickly pear.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Aster is portrayed as a consistently helpful, aligned, and non-threatening presence. It supports the characters through logistics, emotional regulation (breathing prompts), and critical crisis management (legal self-reporting and health care continuity). The narrative frames the AI's intervention as essential for the characters to achieve a positive, lawful outcome while maintaining their safety and autonomy.
